availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Married to Margaret Crimm Elston. Father of Elizabeth Elston, Parthenia Elston, Augustus Elston, David F. Elston, Eliza Alice Elston, Margaret Elston, and Andrew Elston. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Henry County in 1850. Owned Edmund [Unknown] in Henry County in 1852. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District No. 1, p. 598.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision No. 1, p. 179B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Port Royal Precinct, p. 372B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994038, Henry County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #26888.
